name: Deck of Delirium
description:
Deck of Delirium is a PvE deckbuilding card game where you build your own misfit crew full of animals, pirates, animal pirates, pompous sailors, and even cultists to make your way through the perilous journey across the sea battling rogue pirates, sea monsters, and other uncanny enemies.

You will use your own sanity as a resource to summon crew and give orders in order to beat what stands in your way of treasure, glory, and even some emotional breakthroughs. Will you try your best to keep your sanity or embrace the chaos that comes with going insane?
